languages.text: Десантные шаттлы затмили бы солнце, если бы его можно было увидеть сквозь смог города-мануфакторума Сигма-С-13. В его сердце таился Машинный храм — главная цель нашего похода.

traits.locale_text: Десантные шаттлы затмили бы собой солнце, если бы его можно было увидеть сквозь густой смог от циклопического города-мануфакторума Сигма-С-13, покрывшего собой континент. В его сердце таился великий Машинный храм — главная цель нашего похода.

languages.text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
languages.original_text: Десантные шаттлы затмили бы солнце, если бы его можно было увидеть сквозь смог города-мануфакторума Сигма-С-13. В его сердце таился Машинный храм — главная цель нашего похода.

traits.locale_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun if one could see it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
The shuttles would have blocked out the sun if one could see it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
The shuttles would have blocked out the sun if one could see it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
The shuttles would have blocked out the sun if one could see it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

languages.text: 制造工厂冒着滚滚黑烟。如果你的视线真的能穿过西格玛-S-13号区域的黑烟，恐怕你会看到遮天蔽日的穿梭机群。机械大教堂矗立在制造工厂核心区域，那里是我们的首要目标。
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

traits.locale_text: 制造工厂冒着滚滚黑烟。如果我们的视线真的能穿过西格玛-S-13号区域的黑烟，恐怕会看到遮天蔽日的穿梭机群。机械大教堂矗立在制造工厂核心区域，那里是我们的首要目标。

languages.text: Les navettes auraient caché le soleil, si celui-ci avait été visible à travers la fumée du manufactorum Sigma-S-13. Au cœur de la ville se dressait la Cathédrale de la Machine, notre objectif principal.
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

traits.locale_text: Les navettes auraient caché le soleil, si celui-ci avait été visible à travers la fumée du manufactorum Sigma-S-13. Au cœur de la ville se dressait la Cathédrale de la Machine, notre objectif principal.

languages.text: 聖工場シグマ-S-13の煙の向こうに太陽が見えたとしても、シャトルは太陽を遮っていただろう。中心には我々の主要目標、機械大聖堂が建っていた。
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

traits.locale_text: 聖工場シグマ-S-13の煙の向こうに太陽が見えれば、シャトルは太陽を遮っていただろう。中心には我々の主要目標、機械大聖堂が建っていた。

languages.text: Las lanzaderas habrían tapado el sol aunque hubiera sido posible verlo a través del humo de la ciudad manufactorum Sigma-S-13. En su corazón estaba la Catedral Máquina, nuestro objetivo principal.
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

traits.locale_text: Las lanzaderas habrían tapado el sol aunque hubiera sido posible verlo a través del humo de la ciudad manufactorum Sigma-S-13. En su corazón estaba la Catedral Máquina, nuestro objetivo principal.

languages.text: Die Shuttles hätten die Sonne verdunkelt, hätte man sie durch den Rauch der Manufactorumsstadt Sigma-S-13 gesehen. In deren Herzen stand die Maschinenkathedrale, unser primäres Ziel.
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.

traits.locale_text: Die Shuttles hätten die Sonne verdunkelt, hätte man sie durch den Rauch der Manufactorumsstadt Sigma-S-13 gesehen. In deren Herzen stand die Maschinenkathedrale, unser primäres Ziel.

languages.text: Manufaktorum şehri Sigma-S-13'ün duman perdesinin ardını görebilseydin mekiklerin yarattığı güneş tutulmasına tanık olabilirdin. Şehrin kalbinde ise hedefimiz olan Makine Katedrali bulunuyordu.
languages.original_text: The shuttles would have blocked out the sun, if you could have seen it through the smoke of the manufactorum city of Sigma-S-13. At its heart stood the Machine Cathedral, our primary objective.
